data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Torino with the kick-off.
Free kick for Inter in the half of Torino.
In the minute 3, Ashley Young of Inter gets in a strike, but is off target.
Federico La Penna awards Torino a goal kick.
Torino's Simone Zaza breaks free at Giuseppe Meazza. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 3, Inter have a goal kick.
Inter to take a throw-in in Torino territory.
Torino are pushing forward but Simone Verdi's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 5, Ball goes out of play for a Inter goal kick.
Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Inter get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
In the minute 7, Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Inter's Roberto Gagliardini gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Torino at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 9, Federico La Penna signals a Inter throw-in in Torino's half.
Torino's Simone Zaza misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Milan.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Torino at Giuseppe Meazza.
In Milan Torino attack through Simone Zaza. The finish is off target, however.
Inter have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Federico La Penna awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Torino.
Torino's Cristian Ansaldi is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 15, Inter drive forward but Romelu Lukaku is judged offside.
Inter's Alexis Sanchez has run offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In Milan Torino drive forward through Simone Zaza. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 22, Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
In the minute 27, Torino needs to be cautious. Inter have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Inter in the half of Torino.
Can Inter get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
In the minute 30, Important block from the Torino defence as Alexis Sanchez fires in a strike for Inter.
Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
Free kick Inter.
In the minute 31, Simone Verdi for Torino has been booked by Federico La Penna and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
Torino to take a throw-in in Inter territory.
In the minute 33, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 35, Danilo D`Ambrosio (Inter) has received a first yellow card.
Inter have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 37, Torino's Bremer is back in action after a slight knock.
Bremer is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Federico La Penna signals a Inter throw-in in Torino's half.
Throw-in Inter.
In the minute 39, Inter's Romelu Lukaku is whistled for offside at Giuseppe Meazza.
Throw-in for Torino in the half of Inter.
Simone Verdi is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Goal kick for Inter at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 42, Federico Bonazzoli (Torino) has replaced the possibly injured Simone Verdi.
Inter have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
In the minute 44, Throw-in Inter.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Inter in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Goal! Simone Zaza gives Torino a 0-1 lead in Milan.
In the minute 45, Soualiho Meite with an assist there.
Inter have kicked-off the second half at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Alessandro Bastoni is booked for the home team.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 47, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Torino.
Free kick for Inter in their own half.
Romelu Lukaku for Inter is whistled offside.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Torino at Giuseppe Meazza.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Inter in the half of Torino.
Federico La Penna awards Torino a goal kick.
Simone Zaza (Torino) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 52, Throw-in high up the field for Torino in Milan.
Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 53, Goal kick for Torino at Giuseppe Meazza.
Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
Can Inter get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
In the minute 55, Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Inter close to the penalty box.
Inter to take a throw-in in Torino territory.
In the minute 59, Torino will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Inter.
Torino have been awarded a penalty...
Ashley Young (Inter) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 62, Torino are going well in Milan. They now lead 0-2 thanks to a Cristian Ansaldi penalty.
Agony for Inter as Romelu Lukaku 's header comes back off the post and is cleared.
Goal! Alexis Sanchez pulls one back for Inter to make it 1-2.
In the minute 64, Romelu Lukaku instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 65, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Inter make their first substitution with Milan Skriniar replacing Danilo D`Ambrosio.
Antonio Conte (Inter) is making a second substitution, with Lautaro Martinez replacing Roberto Gagliardini.
Inter are coming forward and Romelu Lukaku gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
In the minute 67, Goal! The home team draw level at 2-2 through Romelu Lukaku.
That's a fine assist from Alexis Sanchez.
Free kick Inter.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Inter just outside Torino's area.
At Giuseppe Meazza, Wilfried Stephane Singo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 71, Andrea Ranocchia's header is off-target for Inter.
Federico La Penna awards Torino a goal kick.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Ball safe as Inter is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Wilfried Stephane Singo (Torino) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 74, Torino are pushing forward but Simone Zaza's finish is wide of the goal.
Inter have a goal kick.
Antonio Conte is making the team's third substitution at Giuseppe Meazza with Stefan De Vrij replacing Andrea Ranocchia.
In the minute 74, The home team have replaced Ashley Young with Ivan Perisic. This is the fourth substitution made today by Antonio Conte.
Federico La Penna awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Inter capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Torino's half?
In the minute 77, Free kick for Inter in their own half.
Throw-in for Torino at Giuseppe Meazza.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 80, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Inter.
Inter have been given a penalty at Giuseppe Meazza...
Goal! The home team take a 3-2 lead thanks to a penalty from Romelu Lukaku.
In the minute 85, Simone Edera is replacing Tomas Rincon for Torino at Giuseppe Meazza.
The home team replace Alexis Sanchez with Radja Nainggolan.
Federico La Penna signals a Torino throw-in in Inter's half.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Inter in the half of Torino.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Milan.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Free kick Torino.
Torino drives forward and Simone Edera gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Federico La Penna awards Torino a goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Torino close to the penalty box.
Bremer (Torino) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Inter drive upfield and Radja Nainggolan gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Torino defender.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Torino.
Federico La Penna blows to end the match. The final score is 4-2.
Lautaro Martinez puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 4-2.
Great play from Romelu Lukaku to set up the goal.
The away team have replaced Simone Zaza with Vincenzo Millico. This is the third substitution made today by Marco Giampaolo.
